name: R useR group of Bozeman, Montana
body:
# Welcome to the Bozeman area R useR group!

### Sign up

Sign up on the meetup site:  [Bozeman useR meetup](http://www.meetup.com/Bozeman-useR-Group-R-Programming-Language/)

### Presentations

November 2016 [Intro to Graph Database](http://useRbozeman.github.io/intro-to-graphdb/index.html)

September 2016 [Data wrangling](https://github.com/useRbozeman/data_wrangling)

February 2016 [Makefiles for analysis projects](https://github.com/useRbozeman/Makefiles)

December 2015 [Rmarkdown, Base plot, SelectorGadget, data.table](https://github.com/useRbozeman/rmarkdown-baseplot-selectorgadget-datatable)

October 2015 [Shiny for R backend web apps](https://github.com/useRbozeman/shiny)

August 2015 GIS and spatially referenced data

July 2015 Predictive analytics and kaggle

June 2015 [Improving performance](https://github.com/useRbozeman/FastRMatMult)

May 2015 Planning meeting

September 2014 Knitr, Rmarkdown, pandoc, oh my!

July 2014 [ABC and Rcpp](http://useRbozeman.github.io/abcRcpp/abcRcpp.html)

June 2014 Git and Github
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
